sentences.sContent: She embodies everything I admire in a teacher.
sentences.sCn: 她具备了我所钦佩的教师该具备的一切素质。

sentences.sContent: The latest model embodies many new improvements.
sentences.sCn: 最新的款式包含了许多新的改进。

synos.tran: 体现，使具体化；具体表达

remMethod.val: em(使…) ＋ body(形体) → 使有形 → 使具体化，体现

trans.tranOther: to be a very good example of an idea or quality
